name: part_013
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン卒業LIVE】最大の感謝を込めて。【MurasakiShion Graduation LIVE】 [4RYbmR8oJHw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion and Nakiri Ayame perform the song 'Sparkle' (スパークル) as a duet on a stage with a starry night sky and glowing magical circles.

subtitles.original: 飛ばし読みでいいから
subtitles.english: It's okay to just skim read

subtitles.original: ここからが僕だよ
subtitles.english: From here on, it's about me

subtitles.original: 経験と知識と
subtitles.english: With experience and knowledge

subtitles.original: カビの生えかかった勇気を持って
subtitles.english: And a courage that's started to get moldy

subtitles.original: 未だかつてないスピードで
subtitles.english: At a speed never seen before

subtitles.original: 君のもとへダイブを
subtitles.english: I'll dive towards you

subtitles.original: まどろみの中で 生温いコーラに
subtitles.english: In a daze, with a lukewarm cola

subtitles.original: ここでないどこかを夢みたよ
subtitles.english: I dreamed of somewhere that wasn't here

subtitles.original: 教室の窓の外に
subtitles.english: Outside the classroom window

subtitles.original: 電車に揺られ運ばれる朝に
subtitles.english: In the morning as I'm carried, swaying on the train

subtitles.original: 運命だとか未来だとかって
subtitles.english: Words like fate or future

subtitles.original: 言葉がどれだけ手を伸ばそうと届かない
subtitles.english: No matter how far they reach, they can't get to

subtitles.original: 場所で僕ら恋をする
subtitles.english: The place where we fall in love

subtitles.original: 時計の針も二人を
subtitles.english: The hands of the clock too

subtitles.original: 横目に見ながら進む
subtitles.english: Continue forward, watching us from the corner of their eye

subtitles.original: こんな世界を二人で一生
subtitles.english: Let's live through this world, the two of us, for a lifetime

subtitles.original: いや、何章でも
subtitles.english: No, for however many chapters it takes

subtitles.original: 生き抜いていこう
subtitles.english: Let's live it through

subtitles.original: はじめましてなんてさ
subtitles.english: Things like "Nice to meet you"

subtitles.original: 遥か彼方へと追いやって
subtitles.english: Let's push them far, far away

subtitles.original: 千年周期を一日で息しよう
subtitles.english: And breathe a thousand-year cycle in a single day

subtitles.original: 辞書にある言葉で
subtitles.english: With the words found in a dictionary

subtitles.original: 出来上がった世界を憎んだ
subtitles.english: I hated the world they created

subtitles.original: 万華鏡の中で
subtitles.english: Inside a kaleidoscope

subtitles.original: 八月の或る朝
subtitles.english: A certain morning in August

subtitles.original: 君は僕の前で
subtitles.english: In front of me, you

subtitles.original: はにかんでは澄ましてみせた
subtitles.english: Smiled shyly and then looked coolly away

subtitles.original: この世界の教科書のような笑顔で
subtitles.english: With a smile like a textbook for this world

subtitles.original: 嘘みたいな日々を
subtitles.english: Days that felt like a lie

subtitles.original: 規格外の未来を
subtitles.english: An extraordinary future

subtitles.original: 悲劇だっていいから望んだよ
subtitles.english: I wished for them even if they were a tragedy

subtitles.original: そしたらドアの外に君が全部抱えて立ってたよ
subtitles.english: And then you were standing outside the door carrying it all

subtitles.original: 運命だとか未来だとかって
subtitles.english: Words like fate or future

subtitles.original: 言葉がどれだけ手を伸ばそうと届かない
subtitles.english: No matter how far they reach, they can't get to

subtitles.original: 場所で僕ら遊ぼうか
subtitles.english: The place where we should play

subtitles.original: 愛し方さえも君の匂いがした
subtitles.english: Even the way I loved smelled like you

subtitles.original: 歩き方さえもその笑い声がした
subtitles.english: Even the way I walked sounded like your laughter

subtitles.original: いつか消えてなくなる
subtitles.english: Of your everything that will

subtitles.original: 君のすべてを
subtitles.english: One day disappear

subtitles.original: この眼に焼き付けておくことは
subtitles.english: Keeping it burned into my eyes

subtitles.original: もう権利なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: Is no longer just a right

subtitles.original: 義務だと思うんだ
subtitles.english: I think it's a duty

subtitles.original: 運命だとか未来だとかって
subtitles.english: Words like fate or future

subtitles.original: 言葉がどれだけ手を伸ばそうと届かない
subtitles.english: No matter how far they reach, they can't get to

subtitles.original: 場所で僕ら恋をする
subtitles.english: The place where we fall in love

subtitles.original: 時計の針も二人を
subtitles.english: The hands of the clock too

subtitles.original: 横目に見ながら進む
subtitles.english: Continue forward, watching us from the corner of their eye

subtitles.original: そんな世界を二人で一生
subtitles.english: Let's live through that world, the two of us, for a lifetime

subtitles.original: いや、何章でも
subtitles.english: No, for however many chapters it takes

subtitles.original: 生き抜いていこう
subtitles.english: Let's live it through
